

*State 01 - Welcome*

This state is the landing page for opening the app. Here it will attempt a handshake with the central server and prompt the user to connect manually if necessary.

When a connection is made successfully, the app will prompt the user to press next to continue to [[State 02]], but only on the first launch. Otherwise, it continues to [[State 02]] automatically.
